com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3
Class CompanyDAOBean

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3.GenericEJB3DAO<com.topcoder.clients.model.Company,java.lang.Long>
      com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3.CompanyDAOBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompanyDAO, CompanyDAOLocal, CompanyDAORemote, GenericDAO<com.topcoder.clients.model.Company,java.lang.Long>
public class CompanyDAOBean
extends GenericEJB3DAO<com.topcoder.clients.model.Company,java.lang.Long>
implements CompanyDAO, CompanyDAOLocal, CompanyDAORemote

This class is a Stateless Session Bean realization of the CompanyDAO business interface.

This class has a default no-arg constructor.

This class implements the method available for the CompanyDAO business interface: retrieve clients for company and retrieve projects for company.

See base class for other available operations.

It uses the EntityManager configured in the base class to perform the needed operations, retrieve the EntityManager using it's corresponding getter.

THREAD SAFETY: This class is technically mutable since the inherited configuration properties (with PersistenceContext) are set after construction, but the container will not initialize the properties more than once for the session beans and the EJB3 container ensure the thread safety in this case.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mafy, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Detail

getClientsForCompany

public java.util.List<com.topcoder.clients.model.Client> getClientsForCompany(com.topcoder.clients.model.Company company)
                                                                       throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                                                              DAOException
Performs the retrieval of the list with clients for the given company from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list. Return only the entities that are not marked as deleted.

Specified by:
getClientsForCompany in interface CompanyDAO
Parameters:
company - the given company to retrieve it's clients. Should not be null.
Returns:
the list of Clients for the given company found in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if company is null.
EntityNotFoundException - if company is not found in the persistence.
DAOConfigurationException - if the configured entityManager is invalid (invalid means null here).
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.

public java.util.List<com.topcoder.clients.model.Project> getProjectsForCompany(com.topcoder.clients.model.Company company)
                                                                         throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                                                                DAOException
Performs the retrieval of the list with projects for the given company from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list. Return only the entities that are not marked as deleted.

Specified by:
getProjectsForCompany in interface CompanyDAO
Parameters:

Returns:
the list of Projects for the given company found in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:

DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.
